original_text: There was a war between the king of Syria and Israel. The king of Syria talked with his officers. He said to them, ‘I will attack Israel at a certain place.’
korean_text: 그 때에 아람 왕이 이스라엘과 더불어 싸우며 그의 신복들과 의논하여 이르기를 우리가 아무데 아무데 진을 치리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: There was a war between the king of Syria and Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 시리아 왕과 이스라엘 사이에 전쟁이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The king of Syria talked with his officers.
'I will attack Israel at a certain place.'
